subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Dan Hurley, the coach at Rhode Island, is the son of the Hall of Fame coach Bob Hurley Sr., and one of his assistants, Luke Murray, is the son of the actor Bill Murray.
snippet: Dan Hurley, the coach at Rhode Island, is the son of the Hall of Fame coach Bob Hurley Sr., and one of his assistants, Luke Murray, is the son of the actor Bill Murray.
